reviews.review:
This game is classic. 10/10

Remember when Valve made games?
Um jogo com uma boa história e bons puzzles.
very fun game, its got story and puzzles to get your mind working. i keep coming back to this game

I really like how this game can maintan a good gameplay, graphics that aged well, an OST so immersive, and maybe i'm gonna sound crazy, but it can get relaxing at times.

Even after completing the main game, you can go ahead and play custom levels made by the community (and you can make levels too!), there's plenty of them that willl keep you busy.

And if this ain't enough, you can go ahead and play co-op, it's really fun with a friend, and sometimes it can get pretty funny too.

Overall, this game really is amazing, even today it can be pretty fun, if you haven't tried this game before, you better try it, it's great. [spoiler] (the price can lower to 1$ on sales tho) [/spoiler]

you get hooked easily... you will struggle to put down the game-pad until you finish the current stage.  And even after each stage you accomplish, you'll be curious to try a little bit of the next one and then find yourself struggling to stop again...feels like an addiction.

Cool story too.  Merchant's lighthearted voice is endearing.
很好玩的游戏，需要耗费一些脑力，单机的部分有一定的难度，合作模式没有玩，应该也不错
什么叫好游戏啊？（战术后仰）

Overall this game is a great story with great game play and puzzles.  Other things to note: I played this game before the first game, and I was like 9 years old when I did. But I still sorta pieced together the story by my self. So don't worry if you haven't played the first Portal. But if you want to be safe, Find a summary of Portal 1 and you'll be set. The game play is great, like i said. If your looking for great game play and story, this game is for you. The story is the main highlight of the game for me though.
Superbe jeu qui n'a pas pris une ride !
EXTREMADAMENTE RECOMENDABLE AUN MAS QUE EL PRIMERO!

Was good, but I was kinda bored after beating multiplayer and story.

Kinda wish there was more free roam and more variety when it came to character design.

If I was to give a  1-10 scale.... I would give this game a 6.

Great game, Don't get me wrong, it's a good game. But this game is lacking some of it's true potential by not allowing some free roam around the entire facility.

If there was more exploration involved, I would play it more and give it a 7 or a 8 out of 10.

If you disagree with me. Don't be toxic about it. this is just one review, that is of one persons opinion. 
Got something to say that's *Mean*, Send me a message or say something directly to me. Don't be that coward behind a screen and tell me what you truly feel to me and me alone.. Not the community.
It was really good. I wish there was a third one but.... I still really enjoyed playing this game from the bottom of my heart. I highly recommend  it to any one.
Amazing story, Very sad to see it end.
un classic, formidable du debut a la fin
Es un buen juego para boludear con portales
ta gra jest długa super fabuła działające portale, żele, animacje.
Un must sur Steam, des puzzles sympa et une histoire mémorable!
funny and puzzles whats not to like
me gusta mucho y hay mucho humor
tout est bien, sa ce fini trop vite
One of the best valve games ever made. 10/10 would recommend
Bra action med mycket humor och en bra uppföljare :)
toujours aussi drôle, inventif, et qui a inventé son propre style
This game is fun and it can run on my gameboy with no glitching =)
Надеюсь не я один делаю портал в потолке и на полу чтобы сделать вид как я путешествую во времени, создав свою камеру, где можно лепить портал на потолок?
The sequel to the cult classic portal and better in every way. Fantastic puzzles, great dialogue and characters and a pretty good sense of humour.
its a very fun and good game that you could kill time on easily and have fun with your friends and there is some pretty funny moments

Portal 2 is an amazing puzzle game that is greater than the first. Story wise the game is compelling with Glados stealing the show. In term of the puzzles, the game boasts a complex mind-boggling depth not seen in many games of this style.
Amazing. If you liked the 1st one, get ready for an enhanced experience. You'll won't be disapointed.
porra maluco bom pra caralho ce ta loco????????????????
Super jeux ! narration parfaite, game design au top ! ENORME DURE DE VIE pour 8 euros ;)

De loin une des meilleures saga de l'histoire du jeu vidéo, le jeu est parfait. 
GLADOS
o jogo é bom        recomendo muito

Как я и говорил про 1-ую часть игра не чем не изменилась, в ней также присутствует множество головоломок. Для того что-бы её пройти потребуется слега напрячь извилину.Динамика и атмосфера остались на прежнем уровне.10/10.
Very good game and the puzzles are hard but feels very good and rewardig to complete/solve

This game is my childhood. I used to watch my dad play it all the time. One day on Christmas I finally got my own copy of the game and I've played it for hours and hours. Still to this day I play this game with my friends. Between the great puzzles and hilarious dialogue in this game I find that I always come back to this game.

Hay quien dice que la secuela perfecta no existe, PERO VALVe DICE NO, este juego mejora en todos los sentidos la primera entrega, tenemos una buena historia, personajes memorables, camaras de la comunidad, y corre en vejestorios gracias al motor source optimizado en todo su esplendor, gracias valve.
(no se dejen llevar por las horas de juego que tengo, suelo descargar camaras para jugarlas sin conexion)
This is an amazing game with hours of gameplay and a great story. This game is a big improvment to its pre-successor

Это

Просто

А******

После 1-ой Portal думаешь: "Чё за фигня? Почему всё сначала?", потом к тебе "приходит" модуль Уитли. Вы с ним становитесь "друзьями". Кажется он хочет нам сбежать, но потом раскрываются его истинные намерения. А ГЛаДОС оказывается... не хочет нас убить. После Portal в это трудно поверить! Размеры ЛОКАЦИЙ поражают своими масштабами. Игра отлично оптимизирована. Я прошёл игру за 7.4 часа, а Portal всего лишь за 3 часа! Масштаб игры сразу виден. Но раздражает незаконченность. Вроде уже всё, хватит нас мучит, но нет, на тебе сверху ещё 5 камер. Но я на это просто закрыл глаза и наслаждался игрой. Минусов нет!

100/100


А хотя нет есть. ГДЕ 3 ЧАСТЬ VALVE?!

Con una historia que atrapa y unos graficos excelentes, si te gustan los puzzles este es tu juego.
Tienes que jugar con la inercia del movimiento, portales, ser rapido en las decisiones...
Este tipo de juegos no son mis preferidos, pero este me ha agarrado bien!
bon jeux de stratégie et d'énigme , par contre à déconseiller pour les épiléptiques.
